likes
read_count
comments
desc)sb)shb where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select member_no as memberNo, board_no as boardNo, board_title as boardtitle, board_content as boardContent, board_type as boardType, reg_date as regDate, filename, s.filepath, read_count as readCount, member_id as memberId, m.filepath as profiles, member_grade as memberGrade, (select count(*) from likes lk where s.board_no=lk.board_no) as likes, (select count(*) from comments c where c.board_no=s.board_no and c.board_type=2) as comments from share_board s left join member m using (member_no) where s.board_no=#{boardNo}

select comment_no as commentNo, member_id as memberId, comment_content as commentContent, reg_date as regDate, board_no as boradNO, board_type as boardType, comment_type as commentType, comment_ref as commentRef, (select filepath from member m where c.member_id =m.member_id) as memberImg from comments c where c.board_type = 2 and c.board_no=#{boardNo}
mapper.update: update share_board set read_count = read_count+1 where board_no=#{boardNo}
update comments set comment_content=#{commentContent} where comment_no=#{commentNo}
mapper.select: select like_no as likeNo, board_no as boardNo, member_no as memberNo from likes where member_no=#{memberNo} and board_no=#{boardNo}
